meanings.definition: A fried-dough pastry typically rolled in cinnamon sugar.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed a delicious churro at the fair.
meanings.sent2: The bakery sells churros with chocolate dipping sauce.
meanings.sent3: The churro danced in the hot oil before getting coated in sugar.
meanings.sent4: The churro was a sweet wand of happiness in my hand.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the freshly baked churro filled the room.

meanings.definition: A long, thin, deep-fried dough pastry.
meanings.sent1: The street vendor sold me a warm churro for a snack.
meanings.sent2: She bit into the churro and savored the crispy texture.
meanings.sent3: The churro stretched like a rubber band when pulled apart.
meanings.sent4: The churro was a golden rod of delight on the plate.
meanings.sent5: The churro crackled as I broke it in half to share.
